text: This is a list of Danish television related events from 1965. ==Events== ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ==Ending this year== ==Births== *1 June - Camilla Miehe-Renard, TV host *6 September - Peter Hansen, TV host & producer *23 September - Morten Lindberg, singer, comedian & TV host *21 November - Anne-Grethe Bjarup Riis, actress ==Deaths== ==See also== * 1965 in Denmark
title: 1965 in Danish television
